TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SoapHeaderException extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException

summary.span: 伺服器錯誤的 SOAP 表示。

span.span: The SOAP representation of a server error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 XML Web 服務用戶端將 SOAP 標頭加入至具有的 XML Web 服務方法呼叫屬性設定為`true`，XML Web 服務方法必須設定屬性`true`，否則就會擲回。When an XML Web service client adds a SOAP header to an XML Web service method call with the property set to `true`, the XML Web service method must set the property to `true`; otherwise, a is thrown. 無法設定屬性，根據 SOAP 規格。The property cannot be set according to the SOAP specification for a . > [!NOTE] > 使用 SOAP 1.1 規格的服務通訊協定可以使用的應用程式至存取 SOAP 錯誤。Applications that use the SOAP 1.1 specification as the service protocol can use the to access SOAP faults. 不過，使用 SOAP 1.2 規格的應用程式必須使用至存取 SOAP 錯誤。However, applications that use the SOAP 1.2 specification must use the to access SOAP faults. ## Examples 在下列範例中，呼叫 XML Web 服務用戶端`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法，類型的 SOAP 標頭中傳遞`MyHeader`與屬性設定為`true`。In the following example, an XML Web service client calls the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method, passing in a SOAP header of type `MyHeader` with the property set to `true`. 如果 XML Web 服務方法並不會設定屬性`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭來`true`、就會擲回。If the XML Web service method does not set the property of the `MyHeader` SOAP header to `true`, a is thrown. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
